messages.title: Dementia Tax is wrong
messages.content: Making people who have paid into their whole lives sell their homes to pay for the care they need is unfair. Labour is the only party that will guarantee pensions will go to any pensioner.

messages.title: Vote on 8 June!
messages.content: Only Labour will invest properly in our children's future. Only Labour will invest to reduce class sizes and ensure that all teachers are qualified. That's why I'm voting Labour on 8 June.

messages.title: Under the Tories, our NHS cannot be trusted
messages.content: The Tories cannot be trusted to properly invest in our NHS. That's why we need strong, independent-minded Labour MPs who will fight our corner. I trust Labour to make sure that our NHS is fully funded so that we can get back to delivering for patients.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour MPs will fight for a fully funded NHS to ensure patient care is a priority.
Labour guarantees that pensions will go to any pensioner as a right.
Labour will reduce class sizes to ensure a quality education for children.
Labour will invest to ensure that all teachers are qualified.

issues.education: Labour will reduce class sizes and ensure that all teachers are qualified.
issues.health: Labour MPs will fight for a fully funded NHS to ensure patient care is a priority.

housing.content: Labour will fight the Dementia Tax which forces the sale of homes for care.

endorsements.endorsement: The Tories' Dementia Tax is wrong.
Only Labour will invest properly in our children's future.
Under the Tories, the number of police on our streets has dropped dramatically. Labour's plan is to stop this and add 10,000 extra police officers.
